forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
